title: Episode #34 - Was It Better To Be A Hetaera Than A Wife In Ancient Athens?
itunes:author: History Is Sexy
itunes:summary:
We're back! This week, Emma and Janina take a look at the lives of women in ancient Athens. Was it really better to be a hetaera (courtesan) than a wife?

Sources: https://historyissexy.com/show-notes/episode-34-hetaera-athens
